There are a lot of bad reviews for this app, so clearly this app doesn't work on all Android devices. I have a Samsung A5 and it works great for me. Not all the features work, but they have already explained that in the FAQ section. This successfully blocks incognito tabs for me. I recommend using this app alongside something like BlockerX, which blocks adult content very well and can also prevent you from using the phone's built in browser. This means I can only use chrome on my phone and I cannot use incognito mode. I haven't given this 5 stars because I don't think it's worth the price you have to pay, especially when compared to BlockerX which has a free version which has as many features as this payed app. But this is a good app and thanks to the developers!

Hi Donnie,

Sorry that you are having some troubles. 

I understand that you have enabled Notification Access for Incognito Away, but please check that Notifications for Chrome are enabled too (in Device Settings - App Manager - Chrome ). You can follow the steps on www.smajenterprise.com/ia/help and you should be all good to go :) 

Cheers,
Sam

You need to enable the Uninstall Guard feature. To do this, open the swipe menu (in the top left of the app), and click on Uninstall Guard. Then follow the prompts, and you'll be done!

Cheers
Sam

content: works well to stop tabs, but i wish it was also capable of shutting down a privacy browser...like firefox focus.
replyContent:
Hi Jonathan,

Thanks for your feedback. We are always looking to support more browsers, however it is not always technically possible. Some of these apps such as Firefox, Firefox Focus, Opera, etc are more closed as compared to Chrome, and cannot be supported at this stage.

We'll keep you posted on any updates :)

replyContent:
Hey Paul!

Happy to announce that this app now has Uninstall Protection! :) 
A password can now be required before the app is uninstalled. 

Interestingly, implementing this feature and finding a work around for it was actually more complex than the actual Incognito tab blocking!  

Thanks for you patience and feedback.

Cheers,
Sam

content: This app has been great for my small business.
